TextView.android:text: I understand that I need to be committed to counselling sessions consistently to avail the best possible results. I was made aware of the confidentiality clause and my queries about the same were answered to my satisfaction. Although I know I can stop attending sessions at my own will, I am required to inform about the same before my last session. In case of Medico Legal Issues, I have been made aware that the center doesn't participate and provide any documents due to its internal policy. I am aware that taking counselling is a necessary process and in the long run it has a substantial positive outcome on our psychological well-being. The counsellor is available throughout this process to aid you in a holistic way, which could improve your understanding about yourself and the distressing issues that you could be going through.
